item.description: Pi DayThu, Mar 14, 2019, 6:30 PM: Hi everyone!This meeting will be at a new venue: PeopleSpace in Irvine! From now on, we will be meeting every second Thursday of the month at PeopleSpace.Schedule- Thursday Embedded From Meetup
